name: Mascot Hazel
description: A pretty girl with stunning beauty
story: Hazel disguised herself to recruit more members for the student council. Only a few know her true identity, and once she's finished with her business, she returns to her original appearance.

relations.description: Thanks to Carrot's suggestion, Mascot Hazel receives a lot more help.
Adlay will do literally anything for Mascot Hazel.
Rikoris has no idea who Mascot Hazel is, which amuses her greatly.
Her work would be so easy if she could bring Zerato in, but he's not falling for it.
Mascot Hazel has no need for love, only Yuna's attention.

type.name: Unknown Knowledge
type.description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.

skills.name: Urgent Regen
skills.description: Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Amount recovered is doubled when the target's Health is 50% or less.

skills.name: A Girl in Uniform
skills.description: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 1 turn, before recovering Health of all allies and dispelling one debuff. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.
skills.soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
skills.enhanced_description: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 2 turns, before recovering Health of all allies and dispelling one debuff. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

enhancements.description: Increases Health.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 12%.
Increases Health by 20%.
After using Urgent Regen, if the target is a Fire elemental Hero, has a chance to dispel two debuffs from the target.
After using Urgent Regen, if the target is a Fire elemental Hero, has a 20% chance to dispel two debuffs from the target.
After using Urgent Regen, if the target is a Fire elemental Hero, has a 50% chance to dispel two debuffs from the target.
After using Urgent Regen, if the target is a Fire elemental Hero, has a 100% chance to dispel two debuffs from the target.
Increases unhealable debuff effect chance of Book of Fire.
Increases unhealable debuff effect chance of Book of Fire by 5%.
Increases unhealable debuff effect chance of Book of Fire by 15%.
Increases unhealable debuff effect chance of Book of Fire by 25%.
Increases Speed.
Increases Speed by 1.
Increases Speed by 3.
Increases Speed by 5.
After using Urgent Regen, if all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, recovers Health of all allies by a certain amount.
After using Urgent Regen, if all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, recovers Health of all allies by 2%.
After using Urgent Regen, if all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, recovers Health of all allies by 5%.
After using Urgent Regen, if all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, recovers Health of all allies by 10%.
Increases Speed.
Increases Speed by 1.
Increases Speed by 3.
Increases Speed by 5.
Has a chance to grant continuous healing to the ally for 2 turns if the ally is a Fire elemental Hero when using A Girl in Uniform.
Grants continuous healing to the ally for 2 turns with a 5% chance if the ally is a Fire elemental Hero when using A Girl in Uniform.
Grants continuous healing to the ally for 2 turns with a 10% chance if the ally is a Fire elemental Hero when using A Girl in Uniform.
Grants continuous healing to the ally for 2 turns with a 20% chance if the ally is a Fire elemental Hero when using A Girl in Uniform.
Increases Effectiveness of all Fire elemental allies.
Increases Effectiveness of all Fire elemental allies by 2%.
Increases Effectiveness of all Fire elemental allies by 5%.
Increases Effectiveness of all Fire elemental allies by 10%.
After using Book of Fire, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by a certain amount.
After using Book of Fire, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by 1%.
After using Book of Fire, recovers Health of an ally with the lowest Health by 3%.
After using Book of Fire, recovers Health of an ally with the lowest Health by 5%.
Increases Attack of all Fire elemental allies.
Increases Attack of all Fire elemental allies by 2%.
Increases Attack of all Fire elemental allies by 5%.
Increases Attack of all Fire elemental allies by 10%.

debuffs.name: Unhealable
debuffs.effect: Makes the target unable to be healed.

localize.name: 生徒会広報 ヘイゼル

skill1.name: 炎の書
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、30.0%の確率で回復不可を2ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 緊急回復
skill2.desc: 味方単体の生命力を回復し、自身のアクションゲージを15%UPさせる。対象の最大生命力と自身の攻撃力が高いほど回復量がUPする。対象の生命力が50%以下の場合、回復量が2倍になる。

skill3.name: マスコット・ヘイゼル
skill3.desc: 味方全体に攻撃力UPを1ターンの間付与し、生命力を回復し、弱体効果を1つ解除する。火属性の英雄を指定した場合、攻撃力UPの代わりに攻撃力UP(大)を付与する。対象の最大生命力と自身の攻撃力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 味方全体に攻撃力UPを1ターンの間付与し、生命力を回復し、弱体効果を1つ解除する。火属性の英雄を指定した場合、攻撃力UPの代わりに攻撃力UP(大)を付与する。対象の最大生命力と自身の攻撃力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
